name: Woocommerce order action email
author: Anas

sections.description: Woocommerce order action email allow to add multiple custom order action and send email to customers.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/woo-order-action-email directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Add Multiple Email Woocommerce->Action Emails /wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=woae_email
sections.faq:
How do I add billing information to email message

Add support tags to email post content. You should see support tags below email post editor.
